author: oheger
msg: Prevented TestXMLPropertiesConfiguration to access the internet.
A test case used to load a configuration file which references a DTD. This
caused an internet access. Now an entity resolver is set to avoid this.

author: gmazza
msg: Fixed problem with Atom feeds not rendering.

author: oheger
msg: Removed unused constants from hierarchical configuration classes.
